description.english: Kill 200 enemies
description.schinese: 击杀200名敌人
description.tchinese: 擊殺200名敵人

description.english: Kill 500 enemies
description.schinese: 击杀500名敌人
description.tchinese: 擊殺500名敵人

description.english: Kill 888 enemies
description.schinese: 击杀888名敌人
description.tchinese: 擊殺888名敵人

description.english: Heard all the battle music
description.schinese: 听过所有战斗音乐
description.tchinese: 聽過所有戰鬥音樂

description.english: Accumulated money reaches 9999
description.schinese: 积累的金钱达到9999
description.tchinese: 積累的金錢達到9999

description.english: Purchased all the contents of the mall
description.schinese: 购买了商城的所有内容
description.tchinese: 購買了商城的所有內容

description.english: I am just a normal gamer
description.schinese: 我只是一名普通玩家
description.tchinese: 我只是一名普通玩家

description.english: I'm angry! Nothing can hide my anger!
description.schinese: 我生气了！什么都掩饰不住我的怒火！
description.tchinese: 我生氣了！什麼都掩飾不住我的怒火！

description.english: My cat can only eat cat food from birth to death
description.schinese: 我的猫咪从出生到死亡只能吃猫粮
description.tchinese: 我的貓咪從出生到死亡只能吃貓糧

description.english: I think my cats like to eat Freeze-dried Chicken
description.schinese: 我觉得我的猫咪很喜欢吃鸡肉冻干
description.tchinese: 我覺得我的貓咪很喜歡吃雞肉凍乾

description.english: My master must be well fed, special grade salmon is the minimum standard
description.schinese: 我的主子必须好好供养，特级三文鱼是最低标准
description.tchinese: 我的主子必須好好供養，特級三文魚是最低標準

description.english: I love my cat，my cat love me
description.schinese: 我爱主子，主子爱我
description.tchinese: 我愛主子，主子愛我

description.english: I have something important to do, so I'll leave now!
description.schinese: 我有要事在身，先告辞了！
description.tchinese: 我有要事在身，先告辭了！

description.english: I don't believe in God, if there is a God, then I am God!
description.schinese: 我不相信上帝，如果真的有神，那我就是神！
description.tchinese: 我不相信上帝，如果真的有神，那我就是神！

description.english: The truth is close at hand, but I choose not to see it!
description.schinese: 事实近在眼前，可是我却选择看不见！
description.tchinese: 事實近在眼前，可是我卻選擇看不見！

description.english: I like the cross, probably because it is sacred.
description.schinese: 我喜欢十字架，可能因为它很神圣.
description.tchinese: 我喜歡十字架，可能因為它很神聖.

description.english: I can see that you are guilty at a glance, do not try to hide from my Eagle-eyed!
description.schinese: 我一眼就看出了你有罪，休想躲过我的金睛火眼！
description.tchinese: 我一眼就看出了你有罪，休想躲過我的金睛火眼！

description.english: Sinful women! Let me punish you instead of God!
description.schinese: 有罪之人！由我来代替上帝惩罚你吧！
description.tchinese: 有罪之人！由我來代替上帝懲罰你吧！

description.english: I am a good person, never go to nightclubs and bars
description.schinese: 我是一个好人，从来不逛夜店和酒吧
description.tchinese: 我是一個好人，從來不逛夜店和酒吧

description.english: I like to see beautiful girls, especially dressed sexy girls my eyes will not let go!
description.schinese: 我喜欢看漂亮妹子，尤其穿着性感的妹子我的眼睛不会放过！
description.tchinese: 我喜歡看漂亮妹子，尤其穿著性感的妹子我的眼睛不會放過！

description.english: How can I help others when I can't even put food on the table myself?
description.schinese: 我自己都没办法解决温饱，怎么帮助别人呢？
description.tchinese: 我自己都沒辦法解決溫飽，怎麼幫助別人呢？

description.english: I am very caring and can help if I can
description.schinese: 我很有爱心，能帮则帮
description.tchinese: 我很有愛心，能幫則幫

description.english: I have in addition to money or money, no matter how I spend it, the money is always incomplete
description.schinese: 我拥有的除了钱还是钱，任凭我如何挥霍，钱总是花不完
description.tchinese: 我擁有的除了錢還是錢，任憑我如何揮霍，錢總是花不完

description.english: I like to pinpoint someone's weaknesses so that she will be subservient to me
description.schinese: 我喜欢捏住别人的弱点，这样她就会对我唯命是从
description.tchinese: 我喜歡捏住別人的弱點，這樣她就會對我唯命是從

description.english: My flesh and blood is so cheap that it can only be fed to rats
description.schinese: 我的血肉极其廉价，只能拿来喂老鼠
description.tchinese: 我的血肉極其廉價，只能拿來餵老鼠

description.english: My flesh and blood can be used to feed the Egyptian Anubis (dog), that I am still quite honorable
description.schinese: 我的血肉可以用来喂埃及的阿努比斯（狗），说明我还是挺尊贵的
description.tchinese: 我的血肉可以用來餵埃及的阿努比斯（狗），說明我還是挺尊貴的

description.english: Diagnosis for people all rely on guesswork, because this brings a deadly disaster
description.schinese: 替人诊断全靠猜，因为这样带来了杀身之祸
description.tchinese: 替人診斷全靠猜，因為這樣帶來了殺身之禍

description.english: I am the Chosen One, but there is no suitable time for me to bring the monarch to war
description.schinese: 我是天选之人，可是没有适合的时机让我提君主征战
description.tchinese: 我是天選之人，可是沒有適合的時機讓我提君主征戰

description.english: You are very good at reading people and know what they desire
description.schinese: 你很善于察言观色，知道对方渴望什么
description.tchinese: 你很善於察言觀色，知道對方渴望什麼

description.english: Even in the face of the most dangerous women, you can still control her weaknesses and make her submissive to you
description.schinese: 即使面对最危险的女人，你依然能够掌控她的弱点，让她臣服于你
description.tchinese: 即使面對最危險的女人，你依然能夠掌控她的弱點，讓她臣服於你

description.english: My student days are long gone, I have long been baptized by society
description.schinese: 我的学生时代早已远去，我早已经受社会的洗礼
description.tchinese: 我的學生時代早已遠去，我早已經受社會的洗禮

description.english: Desire is shown too strongly and is seen to be scheming
description.schinese: 欲望表现得太强烈，被人看出了图谋不轨
description.tchinese: 慾望表現得太強烈，被人看出了圖謀不軌

description.english: It will only lead people to the bad side, to the detriment of others
description.schinese: 只会把人往坏的方面引导，损人不利己
description.tchinese: 只會把人往壞的方面引導，損人不利己

description.english: We got off track talking about... Things were going in a strange direction
description.schinese: 我们说着说着就跑题了...事情往着奇怪的方向发展
description.tchinese: 我們說著說著就跑題了...事情往著奇怪的方向發展

description.english: An eloquent tongue to trick naive women
description.schinese: 三寸不烂之舌，骗来天真的女人
description.tchinese: 三寸不爛之舌，騙來天真的女人

description.english: You have defiled the innocent maiden with your filthy hands
description.schinese: 你用肮脏的手，玷污了纯真的少女
description.tchinese: 你用骯髒的手，玷污了純真的少女

description.english: You are so close to me, I can already smell your body odor, very tempting
description.schinese: 你离我这么近，我已经闻到了你的体香，十分诱人
description.tchinese: 你離我這麼近，我已經聞到了你的體香，十分誘人

description.english: Poacher with a bad record are like rats in the street
description.schinese: 劣迹斑斑的偷猎者，犹如过街老鼠人人喊打
description.tchinese: 劣跡斑斑的偷獵者，猶如過街老鼠人人喊打

description.english: My totem represents courage and strength! It is an honor that only a few can possess
description.schinese: 我的图腾代表了勇气和力量！这是少数人才能拥有的荣耀
description.tchinese: 我的圖騰代表了勇氣和力量！這是少數人才能擁有的榮耀

description.english: My jewelry is made of gold, which is a symbol of my status
description.schinese: 我的饰品由黄金打造，这是我地位的象征
description.tchinese: 我的飾品由黃金打造，這是我地位的象徵

description.english: You have aroused her wildest instincts
description.schinese: 你唤起了她最野性的本能
description.tchinese: 你喚起了她最野性的本能

description.english: You used dirty tricks to get her to go against the grain
description.schinese: 你用肮脏的手段，让她逆来顺受
description.tchinese: 你用骯髒的手段，讓她逆來順受

description.english: I am new to the workplace pressure, only to be bullied life
description.schinese: 我是新来的，面临职场压力，只有被欺负的命
description.tchinese: 我是新來的，面臨職場壓力，只有被欺負的命

description.english: School life is so good, I'm not ready to step into society, I still want to learn more years
description.schinese: 学校的生活是多么美好，我还没准备好踏入社会，我还想多学几年
description.tchinese: 學校的生活是多麼美好，我還沒準備好踏入社會，我還想多學幾年

description.english: I'm in power, and now I'm going to get rid of all the forces that oppose me!
description.schinese: 我掌权了，现在我要把反对我的势力统统都清除！
description.tchinese: 我掌權了，現在我要把反對我的勢力統統都清除！

description.english: Care for your subordinates, always praise and commend them, you are a good leader
description.schinese: 关心下属，常常表扬称赞下属，你是个好领袖
description.tchinese: 關心下屬，常常表揚稱讚下屬，你是個好領袖

description.english: Career veterans, step up
description.schinese: 职场老手，步步高升
description.tchinese: 職場老手，步步高升

description.english: Use your power to successfully subjugate your subordinates
description.schinese: 使用你的权力，成功潜规则下属
description.tchinese: 使用你的權力，成功潛規則下屬

description.english: I am afraid to die... Many people are afraid to die... It's normal... It's not my fault.
description.schinese: 我怕死...很多人都怕死...这很正常...这不能怪我
description.tchinese: 我怕死...很多人都怕死...這很正常...這不能怪我

description.english: Recklessness... To get killed…
description.schinese: 行事鲁莽...招来杀身之祸...
description.tchinese: 行事魯莽...招來殺身之禍...

description.english: You are powerful and brave, punishing evil and promoting good, a great hero!
description.schinese: 你威武勇猛，惩恶扬善，是个大英雄！
description.tchinese: 你威武勇猛，懲惡揚善，是個大英雄！

description.english: A weak teammate does you more harm than a strong enemy.
description.schinese: 不怕神一样的对手，就怕猪一样的队友
description.tchinese: 不怕神一樣的對手，就怕豬一樣的隊友

description.english: The devil takes on a human form and deceives all humans
description.schinese: 魔鬼化身为人，欺骗了所有的人类
description.tchinese: 魔鬼化身為人，欺騙了所有的人類

description.english: You have a complete mastery of the structure and touch of the female body
description.schinese: 你完完全全地掌握了女性身体的构造以及触感
description.tchinese: 你完完全全地掌握了女性身體的構造以及觸感

description.english: You are a responsible person, know how to think about others, always put others first
description.schinese: 你是个负责人的人，懂得为别人着想，时刻把别人放在第一位
description.tchinese: 你是個負責人的人，懂得為別人著想，時刻把別人放在第一位

description.english: Show your hand to the other side and not make deals in the dark
description.schinese: 把自己的手牌摊开给对方，不在暗地里搞交易
description.tchinese: 把自己的手牌攤開給對方，不在暗地裡搞交易

description.english: I'm already malnourished from doing such strenuous exercises with you every day!
description.schinese: 天天这么跟你做剧烈的运动，我已经营养不良了！
description.tchinese: 天天這麼跟你做劇烈的運動，我已經營養不良了！

description.english: God abandon those who abandon themselves.
description.schinese: 自作孽不可活
description.tchinese: 自作孽不可活

description.english: I did my job well and met her needs at the same time
description.schinese: 既做好了本职工作，又能满足她的需要
description.tchinese: 既做好了本職工作，又能滿足她的需要

description.english: Doing this on the ground is nothing new, in the air to do the most exciting
description.schinese: 在地面上做这个事情已经是没什么新意了，在空中做最刺激了
description.tchinese: 在地面上做這個事情已經是沒什麼新意了，在空中做最刺激了

displayName.english: Get to the bottom of it

description.english: like to understand each other's information thoroughly, all information can not be spared
description.schinese: 我喜欢把对方的信息了解透，所有信息都不能放过
description.tchinese: 我喜歡把對方的信息了解透，所有信息都不能放過

description.english: What a piece of crap, even the update will crash!
description.schinese: 这什么垃圾玩意，连更新都会死机！
description.tchinese: 這什麼垃圾玩意，連更新都會死機！

description.english: Please fully charge first, and then start using
description.schinese: 请先把电充满，再开始使用
description.tchinese: 請先把電充滿，再開始使用

description.english: This sweeping robot is a bit retarded ... It actually destroyed itself
description.schinese: 这个扫地机器人有点弱智...居然把自己给毁了
description.tchinese: 這個掃地機器人有點弱智...居然把自己給毀了

description.english: You have correctly opened the inherent function of this robot!
description.schinese: 你正确打开了这个机器人的固有功能！
description.tchinese: 你正確打開了這個機器人的固有功能！

description.english: I love you! Even if you were a robot I would still want to be united with you! Never to be separated!
description.schinese: 我喜欢你！就算你是机器人我也会要跟你结合在一起！永不分离！
description.tchinese: 我喜歡你！就算你是機器人我也會要跟你結合在一起！永不分離！
